item.title: Fally Fish Cooker V.05 {SRL}
item.dc:creator: @N4TH4N N4TH4N
item.description:
@N4TH4N wrote:

NextPlayer(False); does Player[CurrentPlayer].Active := False; and then it does CurrentPlayer := CurrentPlayer + 1; and LoginPlayer.

NextPlayer(True) does all of that but doesn’t change the CurrentPlayer to inactive.

Read full topic

item.title: Fally Fish Cooker V.05 {SRL}
item.dc:creator: @bramble bramble
item.description:
@bramble wrote:

I need suggestions to make this script better,

Instructions for use:

  1. Be in Falador East Bank
  2. Have Fish you are Cooking in First bank slot
  3. Fill out Setup, lines for it are designated in script at top(Trip means amount of fish you have to cook/28) will only cook 28 at a time right now
  4. Run Script and enjoy (it uses playerform)

Report all problems to me, i will try to fix them as fast as possible

Future Updates: Fixing the second path(working on it now), Better anti-ban, Cooking less then 28 fish at a time, cooks more then 1 type of fish at a time.

[scar]//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// ____ __ ___ //
// /\ \ /\ \ /\_ \ // // \ \ \L\ \ _ __ __ ___ ___\ \ \____\//\ \ __ // // \ \ _ <'/\'/'\ /' __ \ \ '__\ \ \ \ /’`\ //
// \ \ \L\ \ \ //\ \L._/\ /\ /\ \ \ \L\ \ _\ _/\ / //
// \ _/\ _\ _/._\ _\ _\ _\ _,/ /_\ _\ //
// // // //////////// ///__/ //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//
//Fally Fish Cooker v.05
//
//People who i would like to thank for helping me on this project so far
//1.Boreas(big help dude)
//2.WT-Fakawi
//3.also starblaster for Highestangle procedure
//
//Setup Instructions:
//1.Be inside falador east bank
//2.Have the item you are cooking in your very first bank slot
//3.setup the variables on lines 83-91
//
//FallyFishCooker V.01
//No Anti-randoms
//No LoopBack (meaning does 1 trip)
//No Progress Report
//
//Update V.02
//Now has simple anti-randoms/loopback/progress report
//
//Update V.03
//Has very good walking routines
//Has better door finding routine
//
//Update V.04
//Now supports all available fish in free world
//Fixed 2nd door click
//
//Update V.05
//Now clicks the skill up messages
//

program FallyFishCooker;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\Misc\PlayerForm.Scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/cooking.scar}

var Anchovie,Shrimp,Salmon,Trout,Path,Cooking:integer;
Rando,Martax,Martay,Co,CheckCo,Ax,By:integer;
Check:boolean;Trip,Trips,TripsLeft,Done:integer;Working:string;
CharTrip,CharTripLeft:integer;kill:string;
Herring,Tuna,Lobster,Swordfish,Sardine,Pike:integer;

const
Symbol = ‘water’;
Bank = ‘bank’;

Procedure FreeDaDTM;
begin
if (cooking = Anchovie) then
FreeDTM(Anchovie);
if (cooking = Shrimp) then
FreeDTM(Shrimp);
if (cooking = Salmon) then
FreeDTM(Salmon);
if (cooking = Trout) then
FreeDTM(Trout);
if (cooking = Tuna) then
FreeDTM(Tuna);
if (cooking = Sardine) then
freedtm(Sardine);
if (cooking = Lobster) then
freedtm(Lobster);
if (cooking = Pike) then
freedtm(pike);
if (cooking = Herring) then
freedtm(Herring);
if (cooking = Swordfish) then
freedtm(Swordfish);
end;

//////////Setup for script begins here/////////////
Procedure setup;
begin
cooking := Anchovie; //What are you cooking?
//ex: Anchovie/Shrimp/Salmon/Trout/Tuna/Lobster
//Swordfish/Herring/Pike/Sardine
Trips := 20; // how many full inv trips do you want to do
CharTrip := 10; // how many full trips do you want to do before switching
// keep in mind im setting random value to 3
end;
///////////////////Setup end.//////////////////////

Procedure LoadDTM;
begin
if (cooking = Anchovie) then
Anchovie := DTMFromString(‘78DA632C64626078CA800232329A194480342’ +
‘394CF580E547317554D71F10454354540356F51D5F4F46E425593’ +
‘0154F398805D5540358F18D000238A1A00484D0D11’);
if (cooking = Shrimp) then
Shrimp := DTMFromString(‘78DA632C606260E062644006299E160C22401’ +
‘A26CA980154C389AA665E671DAA9A6AA01A665435CB26B4A0AA29’ +
‘04AA114455737EFF361435003AE608D8’);
if (cooking = Salmon) then
Salmon := DTMFromString(‘78DA639CCDC4C0F08C0105CC4E0E671001D28’ +
‘C503EE30CA09A57A86A0ED7E6A3AA590854F31455CDFEAA1C5435’ +
‘73806A1EA1AA4977B242510300BD7E0BF4’);
if (cooking = Trout) then
Trout := DTMFromString(‘78DA632C626260E0616440067B366D621001D’ +
‘23051C61CA01A7E543547F7ED4355530E54C381AA66DDA245A86A’ +
‘4076B1A3AAA92C2C4051030009CD0A03’);
if (cooking = Herring) then
Herring := DTMFromString(‘78DA63CC6762603064644006678E1E619004D’ +
‘220D1FF40C0980654A387AA06220B2381743A508D190135A59876’ +
‘6155A349404D0D508D367E35008A9D0A4A’);
if (cooking = Lobster) then
Lobster := DTMFromString(‘78DA639CC7C4C010C8C8800C2A5CE41844803’ +
‘448F43F1030F603D584A3AA81C8C248203D19A8C697809A154035’ +
‘2E04D42C04AA89C5AF0600CA8109A7’);
if (cooking = Pike) then
Pike := DTMFromString(‘78DA633CC6C4C060C0C8800C6A66D73088006’ +
‘990E87F2060DC8DA906220B2381F401A01A0B026ACE02D5E81250’ +
‘730AA8461DBF1A0053980A85’);
if (cooking = Sardine) then
Sardine := DTMFromString(‘78DA63F4606260D0656440062567CA1824813’ +
‘448F43F10303A61AA81C8C24820ED0254634C408D2F508D360135’ +
‘5E40356AF8D500006175082C’);
if (cooking = Swordfish) then
Swordfish := DTMFromString(‘78DA633CC2C4C0E0CDC8800C9694AD651001D’ +
‘220D1FF40C0B803A82612550D44164602E96340354E04D49C01AA’ +
‘0920A0E632508D3F7E3500AEFD0B5B’);
if (cooking = Tuna) then
Tuna := DTMFromString(‘78DA63CC636260886464400697CF9E651001D’ +
‘220D1FF40C0980654138CAA06220B23817406504D2C0135154035’ +
‘A104D49403D5F8E2570300734A0A71’);
setup;
end;

function ColorGet(var ax,by : integer): boolean; // gets color of current fish
begin
if (cooking = Shrimp) or (cooking = Anchovie) then
begin
ax := 717;
by := 438;
Co := getcolor(ax,by);
end;
if (cooking = Lobster) then
begin
ax := 711;
by := 445;
Co := getcolor(ax,by);
end;
if (cooking = Sardine) then
begin
ax := 709;
by := 445;
Co := getcolor(ax,by);
end;
if (cooking = Swordfish) then
begin
ax := 710;
by := 440;
Co := getcolor(ax,by);
end;
if (cooking = Trout) or (cooking = Pike) or (cooking = Salmon) then
begin
ax := 708;
by := 447;
Co := getcolor(ax,by);
end;
if (cooking = Herring) then
begin
ax := 708;
by := 448;
Co := getcolor(ax,by);
end;
if (cooking = Tuna) then
begin
ax := 702;
by := 453;
Co := getcolor(ax,by);
end;
end;

Procedure Anti;
Begin
FindNormalRandoms;
If (Not(LoggedIn)) Then
Begin
NextPlayer(false);
End;
End;

procedure lowestAngle; //based on highestangle by starblaster100
begin
if (Loggedin) then
begin
keydown(40);
sleep(1000 + random(100) + random(200));
keyup(40);
wait(1000 + random(100));
end;
end;

Procedure MyOpenDoor;
var doorfound:string;
begin
doorfound := ‘no’;
if (doorfound = ‘no’) then
begin
mmouse(326,150,5,10);
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Door’, ‘Doo’, ‘oor’) = true) then
begin
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Open’, ‘Op’, ‘en’) = true) or (isuptextmulti(‘Ope’, ‘pen’, ‘Open’) = true) then
begin
GetMousePos(x,y);
mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Close’, ‘lo’, ‘se’) = true) then
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
end;
if (doorfound = ‘no’) then
begin
mmouse(245,152,5,10);
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Door’, ‘Doo’, ‘oor’) = true) then
begin
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Open’, ‘Op’, ‘en’) = true) or (isuptextmulti(‘Ope’, ‘pen’, ‘Open’) = true) then
begin
GetMousePos(x,y);
mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Close’, ‘lo’, ‘se’) = true) then
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
end;
if (doorfound = ‘no’) then
begin
mmouse(175,146,5,10);
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Door’, ‘Doo’, ‘oor’) = true) then
begin
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Open’, ‘Op’, ‘en’) = true) or (isuptextmulti(‘Ope’, ‘pen’, ‘Open’) = true) then
begin
GetMousePos(x,y);
mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Close’, ‘lo’, ‘se’) = true) then
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
end;
if (doorfound = ‘no’) then
begin
keydown(38);
wait(200);
keyup(38);
wait(1000+random(250));
mmouse(326,170,5,10);
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Door’, ‘Doo’, ‘oor’) = true) then
begin
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Open’, ‘Op’, ‘en’) = true) or (isuptextmulti(‘Ope’, ‘pen’, ‘Open’) = true) then
begin
GetMousePos(x,y);
mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Close’, ‘lo’, ‘se’) = true) then
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
end;
if (doorfound = ‘no’) then
begin
mmouse(245,172,5,10);
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Door’, ‘Doo’, ‘oor’) = true) then
begin
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Open’, ‘Op’, ‘en’) = true) or (isuptextmulti(‘Ope’, ‘pen’, ‘Open’) = true) then
begin
GetMousePos(x,y);
mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Close’, ‘lo’, ‘se’) = true) then
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
end;
if (doorfound = ‘no’) then
begin
mmouse(175,166,5,10);
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Door’, ‘Doo’, ‘oor’) = true) then
begin
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Open’, ‘Op’, ‘en’) = true) or (isuptextmulti(‘Ope’, ‘pen’, ‘Open’) = true) then
begin
GetMousePos(x,y);
mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Close’, ‘lo’, ‘se’) = true) then
Doorfound := ‘yes’;
end;
end;

end;

function findreddoor(var martax,martay:integer;x1,y1,x2,y2:integer):boolean;
// by Boreas
var dacolor:integer; daboolean:boolean;
begin
dacolor:=200;
repeat
dacolor:=dacolor+1;
writeln(inttostr(dacolor));
if not(((dacolor=206)or(dacolor=217)or(dacolor=233)or(dacolor=241)))
then
begin
daboolean:=findcolor(martax,martay,dacolor,x1,y1,x2,y2);
if daboolean then
begin
exit;
end;
end;
until dacolor=254;
writeln(‘coudnt find it’);
end;

Procedure WalkToRange;
begin
if ( not ( LoggedIn )) then Exit;
wait(1000+random(250));
repeat
if (findreddoor(martax,martay,mmx1,mmy1,676,50) = true) then
begin
mouse(martax,martay,0,0,true);
kill := ‘yes’;
end;
if (findreddoor(martax,martay,mmx1,mmy1,676,50) = false) then
begin
mouse(mmcx,mmcy-15,0,0,true);
kill := ‘no’;
end;
until (kill = ‘yes’);
Flag;
wait(1000+random(250));
setrun(true);
wait(500+random(+1000));
gametab(4);
end;

function FirstPath(var Path : integer):boolean;
begin
Path := 0;
if findreddoor(martax,martay,mmx1,28,mmcx,60) then
mouse(martax,martay,0,0,True);
Flag;
Wait(1000+Random(500));
LowestAngle;
makecompass(‘S’);
wait(1000+random(250));
MyOpenDoor;
wait(1000+random(250));
MakeCompass(‘E’);
wait(1000+random(250));
HighestAngle;
wait(1000+random(250));
LoadDtm;
FindDtmin(X,Y,Cooking,555,205,740,464);
FreeDaDTM;
Wait(1000+Random(500));
Mouse(x,y,5,5,true);
wait(1000+random(250));
FindColorTolerance(x,y,1781205,msx1,30,245,230,50)
Mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
Flag;
wait(1500+random(250));
Mouse(256,404,20,20,False);
ClickText(‘Cook All’,206,354,306,454);
wait(1000+random(250));
end;

//begin

// wait(1000+random(500));
//FindColorTolerance(x,y,1781205,msx1,30,162,230,100)
// Mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
// Flag;
// wait(1500+random(250));
// mouse(256,404,20,20,False);
// ClickText(‘Cook All’,206,354,306,454);
// wait(1000+random(250));
// FreeDaDTM;
//end;

function CheckInv(var Check:boolean) : boolean;
begin
GameTab(4);
wait(1000+random(250));
CheckCo := GetColor(Ax,By);
If (CheckCo = Co) then
Check := False;
if (CheckCo > Co) or (CheckCo < Co) then
Check := True;
end;

procedure Randoness;
begin
Wait(1000+random(+1000));
Rando := 0+random(25);
if (rando = 0) then
PickUpMouse;
if (rando = 1) then
RandomRClick;
if (rando = 2) then
begin
GameTab(2);
HoverSkill(‘cooking’,false);
end;
end;

procedure Cook;
begin
Anti;
repeat
Checkinv(Check);
Randoness;
Anti;
Clicktocontinue;
until(Check = True);

end;

Procedure FirstWalkBack;
begin
findreddoor(Martax,Martay,mmcx,mmcy,680,110);
mouse(martax,martay,0,0,true);
flag;
wait(1000+random(+500));
makecompass(‘N’);
lowestangle;
wait(1000+random(250));
MyOpenDoor;
wait(1000+random(+500));
makecompass(‘W’);
wait(1000+random(+250));
FindRedDoor(Martax,Martay,600,mmy1,655,43);
mouse(martax,martay,0,0,true);
flag;
end;

//Procedure SecondWalkBack;
//begin
// findreddoor(Martax,Martay,640,70,670,100);
// flag;
// wait(1000+random(+500));
// If DoorIsOpen Then
// begin
// end
// else OpenDoor;
// wait(1000+random(+500));
// findsymbol(rx,ry, Symbol)
// mouse(rx,ry,0,0,true);
// flag;
// wait(1000+random(+500));
// makecompass(‘E’);
// wait(1000+random(+500));
//end;

procedure WalkToBank;
begin
FindColorTolerance(x,y,62965,616,mmy1,667,41,40);
mouse(x+10,y,0,0,True);
flag;
wait(1000+random(+250));
makecompass(‘N’);
wait(1000+random(+500));
end;

procedure WithdrawBank;
begin
Withdraw(1,1,28);
wait(1000+random(250));
closebank;
end;

procedure DepositBank;
begin
DepositAll;
wait(1000+random(250));
Withdraw(1,1,28);
closebank;
end;

function Progress(var CharTripLeft,TripsLeft:Integer):boolean;
begin
if (Chartripleft = 0) then
Chartripleft := Chartrip + random(3);
Trip := trip+1;
TripsLeft := trips - trip;
Done := trip * 28;
CharTripLeft := CharTripLeft-1;
// Players[CurrentPlayer].Worked
if (cooking = Anchovie) then
working := ‘Anchovie’
else if (cooking = Shrimp) then
working :=‘Shrimp’
else if (cooking = Trout) then
working := ‘Trout’
else if (cooking = Salmon) then
working := ‘Salmon’;
WriteLn(‘’);
WriteLn(’ Fally Fish Cooker ');
WriteLn(‘Progress Report:’);
WriteLn(‘You have made ’ + IntToStr(Trip) + ’ total trips’);
WriteLn('You have cooked ’ + IntToStr(Done) + ’ ’ + working);
WriteLn(‘You have ’ + Inttostr(tripsleft) + ’ Trips left to go’);
WriteLn('’);
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
Setupplayers;
activateclient;
wait(500);
repeat
loginplayer;
wait(1500+random(500));
repeat
Highestangle;
wait(1500+random(500));
PerfectNorth;
wait(1500+random(500));
OpenBank3;
wait(1500+random(500));
wait(1000+random(250));
if (InvEmpty = true) then
begin
WithdrawBank;
end;
if (InvEmpty = false) then
begin
DepositBank;
end;
if (Co = 0) then
begin
gametab(4);
ColorGet(ax,by);
WriteLn(inttostr(co))
end;
Anti;
MakeCompass(‘E’);
wait(500+random(+1000));
WalkToRange;
// rando := 0+random(+2);
// if (rando = 1) then
// begin
FirstPath(Path);
// end;
// if (rando = 0) then
// begin
// SecondPath(Path);
// end;
Cook;
Setrun(False)
// if (path = 0) then
// begin
FirstWalkBack;
// end;
// if (path = 1) then
// begin
// SecondWalkBack;
// end;
walktobank;
Progress(CharTripLeft,TripsLeft);
until (CharTripLeft = 0) or (TripsLeft = 0);
If (TripsLeft > 0) then
begin
wait(1000+random(500));
NextPlayer(false);
end;
until (TripsLeft = 0);
if (not(Loggedin)) then NextPlayer(false);
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
